overview: WCW Mayhem 1999 features a tournament to crown the new WCW World Heavyweight Champion. Participants include "The Hitman" Bret Hart, Sting, "The Chosen One" Jeff Jarrett, and more. Goldberg faces Sid Vicious in an "I Quit" Match. Scott Hall battles Booker T with both the WCW United States and WCW World Television Championships on the line!
title: WCW Mayhem 1999
